text: Angri is a town and comune in the province of Salerno, Campania, Italy. It was the hometown of Teresina Raiola, the mother of famous American gangster Al Capone, as well Frank Nitti, another famous gangster. It is also where Alfonso Maria Fusco lived and died. ==References== *2001 census data download Istituto Nazionale di Statistica Category:Towns in Salerno
title: Angri
